title: 16: OBITCH Live from SF!
description:
This week is a litttttle different because we had our first live show, and recorded it so you guys could join in on the chaos! We hope you love it! We’ll be back next week with a regular episode from the yellow couch. Tune in to hear about interesting euphemisms, a funeral home mix up, body-snatching, and stay tuned for a Q & A at the end! 
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
Betterhelp: BetterHelp.com/OBIT for 10% off your first month. 
Raycon: BuyRaycon.com/obit to save %15. 
Apostrophe: Save $15 off your first visit with an apostrophe provider apostrophe.com/obit
Sources: 
https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/in-need-cadavers-19th-century-medical-students-raided-baltimores-graves-180970629/
https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.standardmedia.co.ke/entertainment/crazy-monday/2001257518/the-life-of-john-kibera-kenyas-most-wanted-grave-robber-in-history%3famp=1
https://www.google.com/amp/s/hivisasa.com/posts/861-why-i-never-touched-a-luos-coffin---reformed-grave-robber
https://www.chron.com/life/slideshow/8-famous-grave-robberies-127064.php
https://www.google.com/amp/s/ourdailyelvis.wordpress.com/2018/10/02/the-elvis-body-theft-plot/amp/
https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.history.com/.amp/this-day-in-history/grave-robbers-steal-charlie-chaplins-body
https://www.nytimes.com/1982/05/19/us/groucho-marx-s-ashes-taken.html
https://www.amazon.com/Mr-Ed-Obituaries-Famous-People/dp/1402237448/ref=mp_s_a_1_3?dchild=1&keywords=mr+ed+dead&qid=1633632437&sr=8-3
https://www.cbsnews.com/news/lowes-store-nudist-colony-hit-by-robber-say-fla-cops/
https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.huffpost.com/entry/milton-hodges-nudist-colony-robbery_n_1550316/amp
https://readreidread.wordpress.com/2011/04/08/obituary-euphemisms/
https://www.listenandlearnusa.com/blog/obituary-euphemisms/
https://www.nbcconnecticut.com/news/local/funeral-home-cremates-wrong-woman/1877436/ See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
